title: ClinicalAISystemsAgenticMedicine
main_banner_description: Developing agentic clinical AI systems that integrate multimodal data, reasoning, and clinical decision support.

children.title: Clinical Foundation Models
children.description_text:
- Foundation models for large-scale polysomnography (PSG) datasets
- Instruction-tuned LLMs for health checkup interpretation
- Multi-stage evaluation of clinical LLM capabilities

children.title: Clinical Predictive Modeling
children.description_text:
- Transformer and BERT models for sepsis and length-of-stay prediction
- Deep learning-based postoperative pain and stress assessment
- Vascular aging estimation using PPG waveform analysis
- Radiomic tractometry for schizophrenia classification
- Hemiplegic gait detection using wearable inertial sensors

children.title: Laboratory AI
children.description_text:
- Automated clinical chemistry reporting via LLMs
- Machine learning-based sample misidentification detection
- Advanced delta check methods for tumor markers

children.title: Multimodal Clinical AI
children.description_text:
- Graph Neural Networks (GNN) for atrial fibrillation classification
- Objectification of subjective chronic pain via biosignal responses
- Pre-frailty identification using multi-domain clinical data

title: BiosignalClinicalDataIntelligence
main_banner_description: Biosignals and complex clinical data are converted into robust, interpretable intelligence that models and clinicians can trust.

children.title: Biosignal Modeling
children.description_text:
- Autoencoder-based aortic pressure estimation from radial waves
- Calibration-free blood pressure estimation using CNNs
- Surgical pain and mental fatigue assessment via PPG spectrograms
- Continuous pulse transit time calculation algorithms

children.title: Clinical Data Curation
children.description_text:
- AI-based survival analysis for non-linear clinical variables
- Harmonization pipelines for multi-center data bias correction
- Standardization and integration of open PSG databases
- Feature selection for pre-frailty and clinical error analysis

children.title: Physiologic Mechanism Modeling
children.description_text:
- Hemodynamic regulation modeling (BP, PTT, vascular compliance)
- Autonomic nervous system dynamics (HRV, recovery physiology)
- Obesity–inflammation–aging interaction in sepsis
- Short-term physiological signal–based mechanism inference

children.title: Robust Biosignal Processing & Quality Engineering
children.description_text:
- Noise and artifact removal (heart sound, ECG, PPG)
- Ectopic beat correction and RR reconstruction
- Generative signal completion and restoration
- Sensor fusion and gravity compensation
- Deep learning–based signal quality assessment

title: SmartSensingDigitalHealth
main_banner_description: Developing sensing-driven digital health solutions that combine wearable analytics and remote monitoring to measure health continuously in real life.

children.title: Digital Biomarkers & Sensor Analytics
children.description_text:
- Severity-based activity pattern analysis
- Multi-array pressure sensing for wearable monitoring
- Accelerometer-based activity clustering
- Motion-robust sensing in real-world environments

children.title: Digital Therapeutics (DTx)
children.description_text:
- Evidence-based software interventions for disease management
- Data-driven personalization and adaptive treatment algorithms
- Remote monitoring and closed-loop therapeutic feedback
- Clinical validation from translational research to real-world care

children.title: Remote Monitoring & Telehealth
children.description_text:
- Indoor positioning and patient location tracking systems
- Wearable-based vital sign and activity monitoring
- Real-time risk detection and alert protocols
- Mobile, web, and server-integrated telemonitoring platforms

children.title: Wearable & Device-based Sensing
children.description_text:
- Home-based sleep and respiration monitoring devices
- Textile, strain, and pressure sensor–integrated wearables
- ECG, PPG, and multi-sensor cardiovascular measurement systems
- Cuffless blood pressure and digital volume pulse assessment
- Mobile and mask-attached physiological monitoring platforms

title: PopulationHealthClinicalEpidemiology
main_banner_description: Population-scale risk insights from rigorous cohort studies and predictive modeling guide screening, prevention, and care planning.

children.title: Population-level Risk Modeling
children.description_text:
- Development of an atrial fibrillation prediction model using health screening data
- Mortality risk analysis in adult sepsis patients based on demographics and comorbidities
- Survival analysis in adult sepsis patients based on demographics and comorbidities

children.title: Retrospective & Prospective Cohort Analysis
children.description_text:
- Impact of coronary artery disease medications on atrial fibrillation incidence: a retrospective cohort analysis
- Effects of obesity and age on mortality risk in sepsis
- Influence of demographic characteristics and comorbidities on atrial fibrillation onset
- Demographic factors and comorbidities as risk factors for atrial fibrillation: a retrospective study in Koreans
